CmdLine: apt-get update --fix-missing     && apt-get install -y wget g++ make zlib1g zlib1g-dev libgomp1     && cd /usr/local/     && wget -O musket-1.1.tar.gz https://sourceforge.net/projects/musket/files/musket-1.1.tar.gz/download     && tar -xzvf musket-1.1.tar.gz     && rm -rf musket-1.1.tar.gz     && cd musket-1.1     && make     && cp musket /usr/local/bin     && cd /usr/local     && rm -rf /usr/local/musket-1.1     && apt-get remove -y wget g++ make zlib1g-dev     && apt-get autoremove -y     && apt-get clean     && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*     && mkdir /pasteur
Commands.Name: run
